column2: "Dza afei mibisa nye dɛ
column3: Aso Nyankopɔn atow ne man akyen anaa? Ɔnntse dɛm da. Na mankasa so meyɛ Israelnyi a mifi Abraham asefo mu
column4: Benjamin ebusuakuw mu."

column2: "Nyankopɔn nntoow ne man a ohun hɔn siei no nnkyenee. Ana hom nnyim dza kyerɛw no ka wɔ Elija ho? Mbrɛ ɔbɔɔ mpaa kyerɛɛ Nyankopɔn dze tsiaa Israel dɛ
column4: "Ewuradze
column8: na emi so mpo wɔrohwehwɛ me eku me."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn buaa no dɛn? Meyi mbarimba mpemesuon ama moho a wommbuu ntwɛr mmaa Baal."
"Dɛmara na ndɛ mber yi so nyimpa kakra aka a Nyankopɔn adom asan mu eyi hɔn."
"Na sɛ ɔnam adom do a
column3: nna ommfir ndwuma bio: ɔno dze
column4: na nkyɛ adom nnyɛ adom bio."

column2: "Dɛm a nna ebɛn asɛm a? Dza Israel hwehwɛ no
column3: ne nsa annka; na hɔn a wɔasan mu eyi hɔn no nsa kae
column4: na nkaa no piriim hɔn akoma:"

column2: "dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column3: Nyankopɔn maa hɔn sunsum a ɔtɔ nkom
column4: enyiwa a wɔmmfa nnhu adze
column5: nye asowa a ɔnntse asɛm dze ebodu ndɛ da yi."

column2: "Na David se
column3: Ma hɔn edzidzipon nyɛ efir
column4: nye apafir
column5: Nye fintsidua nye akatua mma hɔn:"

column2: "Ma hɔn enyiwa nyɛ kusuu amma woeennhu adze
column3: Na ma hɔn fona mma hɔn mu nkontom daa."

column2: "Na afei mese
column3: Ana wofintsiwii ama wɔaahwe ase? Dabida. Na mbom ɔnam hɔn mfom do na nkwagye abɛyɛ amanamamfo dze
column4: na ɔdze eyi hɔn nyinkun."

column2: "Na sɛ hɔn mfom yɛ wiadze ahonya
column3: na hɔn ahwerdzi ayɛ amanamamfo ahonya a
column4: nna hɔn amayɛ dze ɔbɛkyɛn dɛm dɛn ara?"

column2: "Na hom amanamamfo na mekasa kyerɛ hom. Dɛ meyɛ amanamamfo somafo ntsi
column3: mehyɛ mo som yi enyimnyam
column5: "dɛ bi a mibeyi hɔn a wɔyɛ mo honam no nyinkun
column6: na magye hɔn mu binom nkwa."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔtow a wɔtoow hɔn kyenee ayɛ wiadze nkabɔmu a
column3: ɔgye a wɔbɛgye hɔn no dze ɔbɛyɛ dɛn
column4: nnyɛ nkwa a ofi ewufo mu a?"

column2: "Na sɛ aba a odzi kan no yɛ krɔnkrɔn a
column3: ɔtɔw no so yɛ bi; na sɛ ndwow no yɛ krɔnkrɔn a
column4: nna n’abaw no so yɛ bi."

column2: "Na sɛ abaw no bi ebubu
column3: na wɔdze ɔwo a eyɛ kwaa mu ngodua afora ahyɛ mu
column4: ma enya ngodua no no ndwow nye no mu ngo bi a
column6: "mma nnhyehyɛ woho wɔ abaw no do: na sɛ ehyehyɛ woho a
column7: nnyɛ ɔwo na eso ndwow no
column8: na ndwow no na ɔso wo."

column2: "Na bi a ebɛse dɛ
column3: Wobubuu abaw no
column4: ama wɔdze me aahyɛ mu."

column2: "Ɔyɛ nokwar
column3: ekyingye ntsi na wobubuu hɔn
column4: na wo so gyedzi ntsi na igyina hɔ. Mma mmema woho do
column5: na mbom ma ɔnyɛ wo hu."

column2: "Na sɛ Nyankopɔn ammfa annkyɛ abaw a wofi dua no ara mu fifir no a
column3: ɔremmfa nnkyɛ wo so."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi hu dɛ Nyankopɔn ne yamu ye na ɔyɛ dzen so: ɔnye hɔn a wɔahwehwe ase no dzii no dzendzenndzen
column3: na ɔwo dze ɔkyerɛɛ n’ayamuyie wɔ wo do
column4: naaso gyedɛ ekɔ do araa tsena n’ayamuyie mu: annyɛ dɛm a

column2: "Na hɔn so sɛ wɔannda ho anntsena hɔn ekyingye mu a
column3: wɔdze hɔn bɛhyɛ mu bio
column4: osiandɛ Nyankopɔn botum dze hɔn ahyɛ mu bio."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔwo wotwaa wo dza noara yɛ kwaa mu ngodua ho
column3: na sɛ wokwetsii wo bɔbea dze wo bɛhyɛɛ ngodua pa mu a
column4: mpɛn ahen ara na wɔnnkɛfa yinom a wɔyɛ bɔbea no ara mu abaw no ahyɛ hɔnara hɔn ngodua mu bio?"

column2: "Na
column3: enuanom
column4: memmpɛ dɛ misiw hom esumasɛm yi do
column6: dɛ akomapirim afaafa aba Israel do dze ekodu dɛ amanamamfo nyina bɛba abɛka gyedzi no ho;"

column2: "na ɔno na Israel nyina benya nkwa
column3: dɛ mbrɛ wɔakyerɛw no dɛ
column4: Ɔgyefo no befi Zion aba
column5: Ɔbɛpam emumuyɛ efi Jakob asefo mu:"

column2: "Na iyi nye m’ahyɛmu a menye hɔn bedzi
column3: Ber a mibeyi hɔn bɔn efi hɔ no."

column2: "Asɛmpa no afamu dze
column3: wɔyɛ atamfo wɔ hom ntsi; na nsanmuyi no afamu
column4: wɔyɛ adɔfo wɔ egyanom ntsi
column6: "osiandɛ sɛ Nyankopɔn ma obi adom akyɛdze na ɔfrɛ no a

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ ber a ɔabɛsen hom yɛɛ asoɔdzen
column3: na sesei ɔnam iyinom hɔn asoɔdzen do hom enya ehumbɔbɔr no
column5: "dɛmara so na iyinom ayɛ asoɔdzen sesei
column6: ma ɔnam ehumbɔbɔr a wɔdze ehu hom no do

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn aka hɔn nyina ahyɛ asoɔdzen mu ama oeehu hɔn nyina mbɔbɔr."
"Ao
column3: mbrɛ Nyankopɔn n’ahonya
column4: ne nyansaa nye ne nyimdzee mu dua dɔ a! Mbrɛ N’atsɛmbu mu ntseasee dua yɛ dzen a

column2: "Na woana na oehu Ewuradze n’adwen? Anaa woana na ɔayɛ ne pamfo?"
"Anaa woana na oedzi kan dze biribi ama no
column3: ama ɔno so wɔaahyɛ no ananmu bio?"

column2: "Na adze nyina fi no hɔ
column3: na wɔnam no do ba
column4: na wowie wɔ no mu. Ɔno na enyimnyam nka no afebɔɔ! Amen."
